inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of symptomatic MM, MM + amyloidosis, or POEMS requiring treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: previous history of smoldering myeloma with evidence of progressive disease requiring chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: protein criteria present (quantifiable M-component or urinary kappa or lambda light chain)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: received no more than 12 months of prior chemotherapy for this disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age at time of study entry: 18-80 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ejection fraction by ECHO or MUGA ≥ 40%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate pulmonary function studies (> 50% of predicted on mechanical aspects)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: creatinine < 3 mg/dl and calculated creatinine clearance >30mL/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status of 0-2 based on ECOG criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: signed IRB-approved study ICF (Informed Consent Form)
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She has received prior chemotherapy and is currently on hemodialysis for ESRD.
